title: 2004 BMW 645 Ci
item_description:
2004 BMW 645 Ci

Specifications

  • Year: 2004
  • Make: BMW
  • Model: 645 Ci
  • VIN: WBAEK73414B320555
    • VIN Record Not on File
  • Utah License: B11 7RT
    • Registration Expiration: NA
  • Key: Available
  • GVWR: 4,971 Lbs
  • Body Style: Coupe
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: 235/40R18

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: Atlantic Blue Metallic
  • Doors: Two Doors

Interior

  • Interior Material: Leather
  • Interior Color: Black

Note: Seller Conducted a lien sale (Certification of Lien Sale for Vehicle REG 168A) on March 19, 2018 but was not sold as no qualifying bid was received. The lienholder becomes the buyer. The lien sale paperwork and a new Transfer Form will be mailed 1-2 weeks after removal. This vehicle is being sold with lien sale paperwork, and is not registered with California DMV, Seller will not perform smog. The buyer agrees to repair if needed and smog the vehicle, an "as-is" no smog bill of sale must be signed by the Seller/Buyer. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of smog, registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV. Description updated 11/4/2024 at 12:32 pm.Â
